Topic.Title: Search or objects with parent = null

Posts.EditableText: Last question for the week... If you remove an object with RemoveObject(item), I believe that it is not destroyed, but merely sets its parent to Null. How do I search for these items with a parent of null. I have tried: if (object.parent = null){ } But it is not finding it.

But it is not finding it.
